RetroArcher
===========
`RetroArcher <https://retroarcher.github.io>`_ is a gaming plug-in for `Plex Media Server <https://www.plex.tv>`_!
The goal of RetroArcher is to use your media server as a gaming front end interface and then use proven game streaming
technology to stream your gameplay to any of your standard clients.
